"Shirase": "This robot here is missing some technology, and we don't currently have the resources to craft a replacement."
"We've usually substituted missing parts by making them out of already existing spare parts..."
"This broken robot uses a strange power source, but I should be able to make something that functions close to it with the right materials."
"It's just, the camp can't really afford to spare the materials we do have..."
"I know it's really unbecoming to ask this of you, but..."
"Would you happen to have some Photon Chunks you could spare?"
